text: Go an iyan masiksa so pphamanangin a manga mama, go so pphamanangin a manga babay, go so manga pananakoto a manga mama, go so manga pananakoto a manga babay, a ipagaarangan iran so Allah sa arangan a marata; sii kiran so pkhagolinggoling a marata: Na kiyararangitan siran o Allah go pimorkaan Iyan siran, go inithiyagar Iyan kiran so Jahannam. Na mikharatarata a khabolosan
